property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT m.id_set,m.set_value FROM m_gset_d m WHERE m.id_set='SYSTEMBASE' and m.set_seq=1 and m.set_apply=1

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT m.id_set,m.set_value FROM m_gset_d m WHERE m.id_set='SERVICEROW' and m.set_seq=1 and m.set_apply=1

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT m.location_name, m.id_location FROM m_location m WHERE m.is_deleted='0' ORDER BY m.location_name asc

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT m.id_user, m.user_name FROM m_user m WHERE m.id_user in( SELECT e.pic FROM m_wf_action e, m_atr_tfr d WHERE e.section_no = d.section_no and e.action_type='AA' )

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT a.id_user, b.role_name FROM m_user a, rolemaint b WHERE a.id_role=b.id_role

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT r.RESOURCE_ID, r.VALUE FROM RESOURCESMAINT r WHERE r.category='PAYMENT_REF_HEADER'

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT bank_full_name, bank_full_name FROM m_bank

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id_sub_module,sub_mod_name FROM m_sub_modules where IS_FUNCTION_NAME= '1' ORDER BY sub_mod_name ASC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id_user, id_user as name FROM m_user ORDER BY id_user

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id_user, user_name FROM m_user WHERE is_deleted=0 AND user_status=1 ORDER BY user_name

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT a.id_user, a.user_name FROM m_user a WHERE a.is_deleted=0 ORDER BY a.user_name

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id_dept, dept_name FROM deptmaint WHERE is_deleted='0' ORDER BY dept_name

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id_div, div_name FROM divmaint WHERE is_deleted='0' ORDER BY div_name

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id_role, role_name FROM rolemaint WHERE is_deleted='0' ORDER BY role_name

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id_cust, cust_name FROM m_cust WHERE is_deleted='0' ORDER BY cust_name ASC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT id_screen, screen_desc FROM m_screen ORDER BY id_screen

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID_TAX,'[' || TAX_RATE || '%]' || DESCRIPTION1 AS TD FROM M_TAX WHERE IS_DELETED=0 order by ID_TAX

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT ID_TAX,TAX_RATE TD FROM M_TAX WHERE IS_DELETED=0 order by ID_TAX

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT A.RATETYPE_CODE,'[' || A.RATETYPE_CODE || ']' || A.RATETYPE_DESC AS TD FROM M_RATE_TYPE2 A WHERE A.IS_DELETED=0 ORDER BY A.ID_RATETYPE

entry.value: S. Georgia and S. Sandwich Isls.

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT H.RESOURCE_ID, H.VALUE FROM RESOURCESMAINT H WHERE H.CATEGORY='CLOSEDOCTYPE' AND H.IS_DELETED=0

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT CO_CATEGORY, CO_CATEGORY_DESC FROM M_CO_CATEGORY ORDER BY CO_CATEGORY_DESC ASC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT CO_SUBCATEGORY, CO_SUBCATEGORY_DESC FROM M_CO_SUBCATEGORY ORDER BY CO_SUBCATEGORY_DESC ASC

property.name: jndiName
property.value: java:comp/env/jdbc/BsysDataSource

entry.value: The Bank of Nova Scotia Berhad
The Royal Bank of Scotland Berhad

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT AFFILIATE_CODE, AFFILIATE_DESC FROM M_AFFILIATE WHERE IS_DELETED=0 order by ID_AFFILIATE

property.name: applicationContextSchedulerContextKey
property.value: applicationContext

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT SET_VALUE,SET_DESC FROM M_GSET_D WHERE ID_SET = 'COLUMN_VALUE_NAME' AND SET_APPLY = 1 ORDER BY SET_SEQ

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT SVC_GRP, SVC_GRP_NAME FROM M_SVG ORDER BY SVC_GRP_NAME ASC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT END_USER_CODE, END_USER_DESC FROM M_END_USER WHERE IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY ID_END_USER ASC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT RESOURCE_ID, VALUE FROM RESOURCESMAINT WHERE CATEGORY = 'EXPORT_LIMIT' AND IS_DELETED = '0' ORDER BY SEQ ASC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT TRIM(E.SVC_GRP), TRIM(E.PRODUCT_CODE) FROM M_PRODUCT E WHERE E.IS_DELETED = '0' ORDER BY E.SVC_GRP ASC, E.PRODUCT_CODE ASC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT CO_TYPE, CO_TYPE_DESC FROM M_CO_TYPE WHERE IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY CO_TYPE_DESC ASC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT (TO_CHAR(A.MIN,'YYYY')+ROWNUM-1) year_id, (TO_CHAR(A.MIN,'YYYY')+ROWNUM-1) year_name FROM ( SELECT TO_DATE(MAX(fiscal_end),'YYYYMM') MAX, TO_DATE(MIN(fiscal_start),'YYYYMM') MIN, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM(to_date(max(fiscal_end), 'YYYYMM'))) - EXTRACT(YEAR FROM (to_date(min(fiscal_start),'YYYYMM'))) RANGE FROM T_REV_FISCAL_YEAR )A CONNECT BY ROWNUM <= A.RANGE+1 ORDER BY year_id DESC

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT M.JOURNAL_NO, M.JOURNAL_NO||'-'||M.DESCRIPTION FROM M_JOURNAL_NO M WHERE M.IS_DELETED = 0 ORDER BY M.JOURNAL_NO

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT SET_APPLY FROM M_GSET_D WHERE ID_SET = 'BATCH_PRINT_OPTION' AND IS_DELETED = 0

property.name: sql
property.value: SELECT SET_VALUE AS "LABEL_DESC" FROM M_GSET_D WHERE ID_SET = 'LABEL_DESC' AND IS_DELETED = 0 AND SET_SEQ=1
